attributes.action: Make Spanish, a modern language COMPULSARY in all secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make spanish a compulsary subject in all secondary schools in England and Wales.(some schools already learn it, others don't). Spanish is in the top 10 spoken languages around the world, so why do our children learn French, which is spoken in about 3 countries?
